title: SOLD  Hick Cady and Les Nunamaker RPPC for Sale
author: aelefson

posts.post_title: SOLD  Hick Cady and Les Nunamaker RPPC for Sale
posts.post_content:
THIS POST CARD HAS BEEN SOLD

Hi-
           Below are scans of a circa 1910 Hick Cady and Les Nunamaker real photo postcard that I am looking to sell.  The back says this postcard is from Hot Springs Arkansas.  All of the corner tips are creased and there is scrapbook paper and glue residue on the back.  I am looking for 350.00 or best offer for this postcard.  Please let me know if you are interested, have any questions, or need better scans.

Thanks,
Alan
[url]aelefson@hotmail.com[/url]
